attributes.action: death penalty by lethal injection for all who committ murder
attributes.additional_details:
Ther are far to many murders and it is time people made a stand, these people get 15 to20 years and still will be out in around 10 to 15, and still have there life. where as the victim looses his or hers and there familys have to live with there loss.
I would like the goverment  to introduce this penalty this is the only way we can  try to stop all this murder happening, if they know they could loose there own life it might make them stop and think.
And apart from the saving the country will make from not having to keep them in prison.
